alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 15 at 5:55PM CDT until June 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Waurika, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Waurika, Ryan, Addington, Sugden, Grady, Oscar, and Petersburg. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter, safe room or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
